name: SIMON SAID
description:
Welcome to SIMON SAID™, the video game based on the 80's toy Simon Says™!

In SIMON SAID, you have to repeat Simon's sounds - but here's the catch! You have to play them one (or more) beat(s) after him, while he's playing! This results in a musical canon and an incredibly exhausting rhythm game! Something for players to agonize upon but TAS bots to cherish.

Made by 89o, menu music made by Daen.

Made for ScoreSpace/Polycade Jam.
